title: Is the Tide Turning? | Guests: David Harsanyi & Bjorn Lomborg | 10/27/21
description:
Glenn reads an article on why we should be more optimistic that America is on the right track. The president and the media used to trust Americans. When did they stop? Glenn shares photos sent to him from the audience showing empty store shelves across America. Asra Nomani, vice president of Parents Defending Education, joins to share the latest on the war against the school boards. NBA player Enes Kanter is speaking out against the NBA and Nike. David Harsanyi, author of "Eurotrash," joins to discuss why America must reject European policies, not implement them. Bjorn Lomborg, author of "False Alarm," joins to discuss President Biden’s costly climate change agenda.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
